div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1237 Asia Minor, northern, c. 1920 (77) Burial: c. 350 B.C. (M) Contents: 230+ AR Trapezus: a few dr. and trihemiob. ANS 1944.100.41440 Sinope: 226+ dr. Disposition: London 28; New York 2; Naville, July 2, 1930, nos. 871-84 Robinson, NC 1930, pp. 1-15, illus.; 1932, p. 205, illus.
